text.value: Fortinbras is like Hamlet in some ways but unlike him in others. Identify two characteristics in which they are similar –

value.value: throne passes from his father to his uncle
both their fathers were kings, yet neither sons succeeds to the throne
Fortinbras’ father was defeated by Old Hamlet – both sons seek redress
Hamlet can fence but has never led an army
Fortinbras is serious and determined, Hamlet can be witty and playful
Hamlet prevaricates and delays; Fortinbras gets on with the job
Hamlet only seems to have one close friend and follower
